meaningMnemonic: The <radical>demon</radical> radical and the <kanji>demon</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Wicked!
readingMnemonic: How do you keep a <kanji>demon</kanji> locked up? Use a <reading>key</reading> (き). Use a lock and key and keep that demon locked up safely behind bars so he can’t get out and do bad demon stuff.
